commits.message:
Add first set of new admin tools

This is the first batch of replacement admin tools for the service
management epic, EUCA-10341.  Apart from revamping the CLI experience
for cloud administrators, this also introduces some nomenclature changes
in an effort to reduce confusion:

  - Components are now called service types.
  - Services are now called instances of service types for the sake of
    clarity.
  - Partitions are now called availability zones.
  - The term "property" has been eliminated.

The empyrean-* commands implement empyrean calls for EUCA-10481.

The euctl command iplements the new property management UX for
EUCA-10661.

empyrean-describe-services's --filter option has not yet been
implemented on the server side.  (EUCA-10639)

empyrean-deregister-service will silently do nothing when given a
service instance that does not exist.  (EUCA-10481)
